action_item: Reports - Ensure all demographic fields are complete for accurate reporting.
notes: Focus on fields related to sexual orientation, client identity, birth sex, country of origin, ethnicity, race, language, homeless status, and veteran status.

action_item: Requirements - Document the need for a sliding fee scale based on grant specifications.
notes: Ensure that the sliding fee scale aligns with the Ryan White HIV grant requirements.

action_item: Client Portal - Investigate customization options for client intake forms in the patient portal.
notes: Check with Chris about the ability to trigger additional questions based on the program.

action_item: Data Migration - Assess the feasibility of migrating eligibility information into the new EHR.
notes: Consider integrating forms that are currently scanned into NextGen to streamline data entry.

action_item: Interface - Explore the possibility of creating a system interface to reduce manual data uploads.
notes: Aim to automate data entry from clients to minimize reentry of information.

action_item: Reports - Ensure the ability to run reports on newly added fields in the EHR.
notes: Identify mandatory fields required by the county for reporting.

action_item: Payers - Confirm language capabilities for the patient portal to accommodate non-English speaking clients.
notes: Ensure the portal can support at least the seven languages specified in the RFP.
